text: Kim Cattrall has killed all hope of another installment of the popular Sex And the City movie. And now Sarah Jessica Parker has also confirmed the third movie is not in the works when she spoke to Variety on Thursday in New York City. The 53 - year - old was attending the Women In Film & Television's Muse Awards gala luncheon when she revealed it wouldn't be happening at this time. Sorry fans!
